HeroSection.Text: residential and commercial spaces over 20 years of design

HeroSectionMobile.MainText: WE IMPLEMENT IDEAS INTO A SIGNIFICANT ASSET

factsSection.left: 75% Loyal customers 120+ projects Total area 2 million m²
factsSection.center: One of the first companies in Kazakhstan to implement BIM, LEED and BREEAM technologies

reviews.review: NAO «Narxoz University» confirms that KZSTRATA LLP developed the draft and working documentation for the reconstruction of the university building (Almaty, Zhandosov St. 55) in the period from 24.07.2020 to 08.04.2021. The work was completed efficiently and on time, in compliance with Kazakhstani legislation and international standards. We note the high professionalism and recommend the company as a reliable designer.
reviews.name: K.A.Amenova
